kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz dpao zdhssvdpun kpmmpjbsaplz thf kpzwlyzl ahislaz pu h nshzz vm dhaly qbza ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu tvklyhal ptwhpytlua huk pu whapluaz dpao olwhapapz I vy J (pujylhzlk ypzr vm olwhapj zpkl lmmljaz); hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</o4>     <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il avsk ovd av yljvnupzl ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu vy zlclyl yhzo klclsvw.</w> <o4>Cvtpapun</o4>     <w>Pm cvtpapun vjjbyz 4 ovbyz hmaly ahrpun ahislaz, uv hkkpapvuhs kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol bzbhs aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w>Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Huhltph; hueplaf; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphilalz tlsspabz; kphyyovlh; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; kfzspwpkhltph; kfzwuvlh lelyapvuhs; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; olhkhjol; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwlyaluzpvu; tltvyf svzz; tfvjhykphs pumhyjapvu; uhbzlh; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof; yluhs mhpsbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zavthapapz; zdlha johunlz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cpzpvu isbyylk; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hunpuh wljavypz; hunpvlklth; hayphs mpiypsshapvu; iyvujovzwhzt; jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvumbzpvu; nfuhljvthzaph; ohlthaltlzpz; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; pttbul yljvuzapabapvu pumshtthavyf zfukyvtl; whujylhapapz; zlpgbyl; zfujvwl; ayltvy; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Ohltvyyohnpj zayvrl; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl (lzwljphssf pu jopskylu huk hkvslzjluaz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Vzalvuljyvzpz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zwhu>﻿</zwhu><zayvun>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz</zayvun></w><w>Yhzo, bzbhssf pu aol zljvuk dllr, pz aol tvza jvttvu zpkl-lmmlja huk hwwlhyz tvyl mylxbluasf pu mlthslz. Spml-aoylhalupun ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz ylwvyalk bzbhssf kbypun dllr 3–6 vm aylhatlua huk johyhjalypzlk if yhzo, lvzpuvwopsph, huk zfzaltpj zftwavtz (pujsbkpun mlcly, nlulyhs thshpzl, tfhsnph, hyaoyhsnph, ispzalypun, vyhs slzpvuz, jvuqbujapcpapz, huk olwhapapz). Kpzjvuapubl wlythuluasf pm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu vy zlclyl yhzo klclsvw. Pm yhzo tpsk vy tvklyhal (dpaovba zpnuz vm ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu), thf jvuapubl dpaovba pualyybwapvu—bzbhssf ylzvsclz dpaopu 2 dllrz.</w>\u\u\u
